A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This film is dissaster for the Star Wars brand which I am big fan of. Partyl stolen BS Gallactica\, partyl copied original movies (really?)\, totaly stupid dialoges\, absurd plot (who the hell was the main evil guy that died so stupidly\, why is Skywalker retarded\, when he was one hell of a character\, why the f*ck do he die\, etc. )... How can you say that war just started when no ally answers your calls and you are left with only few transport ships :DDDD.. If all that is left of rebellion is 30 people.. no commnet.

Why is some stupid woman staying on the bridge saying she has to stay\, when she walks there doing absolutely nothing\, just watching  transporters die.. Even with the original plan\, she wants to suicide\, so why not the fuck turn it around and pretend all the rebels suicided to kill the main bad guy. Its so freaking stupid movie\, that it beats even episode VII which I and my friends thought could never be beaten. 

Joda back? Why now\, what the fuck? The evil pit under the island? Just stupid empty mirror? WTF? Random girl learning all the jedi powers\, tricks\, lightsaber stuff with abs no training? Why is it still only copy of previous episodes with differents characters?
This is so freaking bad it makes me wanna hang myself :D 

The only positive rating goes for the penguin like creatures that annoy the hell out of chewie (another pointless character there)\, island joke with the falling stone  and poetic ending of random Harry potter controlling broom with his will gazing at the stars. 

PS I still feel like it was just mixture of Harry Potter and BSG.. 
So dissapointed that I write my first movie review ever\, because normally I don't give a damn. 

Sorry to say this\, but even The Room is better movie than this
